COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc4
STRING: Until the next letter, then.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe2
STRING: Chris.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x162
STRING: In the letter that arrived today, Chris didn't talk about
his graduation recital.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x178
STRING: Even though November was almost over.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x184
STRING: Even though there was only two months until the
recital.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x190
STRING: I wrote my letter quickly and started to get ready to go
out.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c6
STRING: The contents were about Torta being worried.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d2
STRING: And then it was nothing special.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1de
STRING: It was a letter of lies stacked on lies, all for Chris.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ea
STRING: If you were counting, the majority was truth, and only
the small amount remaining was lies.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x200
STRING: However... Each lie was too big, so big that I was afraid
to tell him the truth.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x216
STRING: That's why I just couldn't continue.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x222
STRING: I had to do that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x246
STRING: Going over these things in my mind, I tied up my hair
and braced myself.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25c
STRING: When I did that, my face naturally changed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x268
STRING: It was just like I had become someone else.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27c
STRING: No... That other person wasn't the me reflected in the
mirror now.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x292
STRING: The person who was in front of me until a moment ago,
wasn't me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2be
STRING: I moved my hands and the ribbon away, and let my hair
down.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ee
STRING: [Torta] “Arietta...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x304
STRING: My older twin sister was talking to me from the mirror.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x310
STRING: I was doing that a lot recently.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x31c
STRING: I felt just like she was talking to me from inside the
mirror.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x332
STRING: [Torta] “You're so silly...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x360
STRING: I mumbled this and tied my hair up again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x36c
STRING: [Torta] “I am Tortinita...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x382
STRING: I called my own name once, and undid the buttons at
my back to get undressed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3da
STRING: [Torta] “I'll be right back.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x40c
STRING: [Ninna] “Alright, be safe. Hurry home.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x422
STRING: [Torta] “It's fine. I'm just going to send a letter.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x440
STRING: [Ninna] “You always say that and then come back late.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x456
STRING: [Torta] “These things happen. Okay, I'm off.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4a4
STRING: I changed into my normal outfit, and ran outside.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4b0
STRING: Now I almost couldn't feel any of my earlier depression.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4c6
STRING: When I wrote letters, sometimes I certainly felt like I
was someone else.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4dc
STRING: Not Tortinita, but Arietta.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4f2
STRING: Even so... I was me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4fe
STRING: I wasn't writing lies.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x50a
STRING: My feelings about Chris... All of it was true.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x516
STRING: I can swear only that was the truth.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x522
STRING: I had liked Chris for a long time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x538
STRING: Way before my sister started liking Chris.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x574
STRING: I came to the roads of the Old District and walked to
the mailbox.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x580
STRING: The two envelopes were properly affixed with red
stamps for express mail, and had the proper postage,
which was pretty expensive.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5a0
STRING: I checked them again, and tossed them into the
mailbox.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5c6
STRING: It was still just past three o'clock.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5d2
STRING: Letters were usually taken from this mailbox between
four o'clock and nighttime every week.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5e8
STRING: Because there was no way to this city except by train,
the time would change depending on the day.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5fe
STRING: I was frequently just on time for the earliest collection,
but I had never been late.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x614
STRING: And I was sure I wouldn't be in the future.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x628
STRING: [Chris] “Oh, Torta.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x63e
STRING: [Torta] “Huh...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x678
STRING: [Chris] “What's going on? Why are you here?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x68e
STRING: [Torta] “I should ask you, Chris... You got home early.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6a4
STRING: My pulse quickened in an instant.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6b0
STRING: I didn't think he saw me, but I was careful just in case.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6e2
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, I guess... My lesson is finished so I
practiced a little on my own and was on my way home.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x702
STRING: [Torta] “Wow, just a little?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x734
STRING: [Chris] “Oh come on...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x74a
STRING: [Torta] “You mean just the two hours since we parted
after lunch.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x77c
STRING: [Chris] “I'd appreciate it if you'd rephrase that as two
whole hours.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x792
STRING: [Torta] “Ugh...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7a8
STRING: I wrote about his partner in the letter from Arie, so I
didn't mention it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7be
STRING: Regardless, he wasn't mentioning the letters or the
mailbox, so I thought I was fine.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7f0
STRING: [Chris] “It's a free country, isn't it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x806
STRING: [Torta] “I suppose that's true.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x81c
STRING: I was a good thing that Chris didn't notice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x828
STRING: My original shock slowly subsided as we spoke.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x83e
STRING: I had gotten really good at lying.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x84a
STRING: It wasn't something to brag about, but it was the most
necessary thing for me at the moment.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x860
STRING: More than my singing ability, more than anything.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x874
STRING: [Chris] “Don't you have anything to do today, Torta?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x88a
STRING: [Torta] “That's already finished.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8a0
STRING: That was the truth.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8ac
STRING: I had already sent the letters.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8d4
STRING: [Chris] “You're as strict about time as ever.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8ea
STRING: Chris said that with understanding, like it was a
compliment.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x900
STRING: The fact that Chris didn't ask what I did may have been
proof of his prudence.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x916
STRING: Maybe he was unconsciously afraid of knowing, or
maybe it was a clumsy way of caring.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x92c
STRING: [Torta] “So, what are you going to do now?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x95e
STRING: [Chris] “Nothing, I'm going home.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x974
STRING: [Torta] “I see. I'm going shopping now, do you want to
come, Chris?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9b0
STRING: [Chris] “No, I don't really have any shopping to do.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9c6
STRING: [Torta] “Right. Well, see you tomorrow.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9e4
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, see you then.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa06
STRING: Chris went home as if nothing had happened.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa12
STRING: When nothing was going on...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa1e
STRING: Whenever I invited him, Chris would always run away
like that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa34
STRING: He was probably doing it out of consideration for Arie,
but that was quite strange as well.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa4a
STRING: All those letters that Chris was sending to Arie... Were
actually to me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa60
STRING: And Chris just believed that blindly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa6c
STRING: Perhaps Chris would listen to words in a letter from Arie
more than if I said them.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa82
STRING: I felt the hard-to-resist pull of that dark power, and it
frightened me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa98
STRING: But it the end, I wrote it in the letter.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaae
STRING: “Why not Torta?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xac2
STRING: I was a terrible woman.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb08
STRING: I did some basic shopping just like I told Chris I would,
then I arrived at the train station like always.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb1e
STRING: I could still remember every detail of the words Chris
said when we first arrived in this city.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb54
STRING: [Chris] “I can hear the sound of the rain.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb6a
STRING: That was already three years ago.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb80
STRING: Chris definitely said that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbfe
STRING: [Torta] “Hey, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc28
STRING: Chris slumped in his seat and gazed outside with dead
eyes.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc3e
STRING: No matter what I said, he didn't reply.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc4a
STRING: Maybe I shouldn't have forced him to leave the hospital.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc56
STRING: But that wasn't just my decision, everyone got him out.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc62
STRING: I thought it was the best thing at the time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc6e
STRING: And now that we had come this far, it was too late.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc8e
STRING: The scene outside the window suddenly changed, and I
turned to look at it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc9a
STRING: When we left the tunnel, the sky was already dark.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcae
STRING: [Chris] “Aaaggh!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcdc
STRING: [Torta] “Chris!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcf2
STRING: Chris suddenly covered his ears and curled into a ball.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcfe
STRING: [Torta] “Are you okay? Does it hurt?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd1c
STRING: [Chris] “Uhhh... Ahhh...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd32
STRING: Several people who had already returned from the
sleeping car looked at us.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd48
STRING: [Torta] “It's... It's alright.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd5e
STRING: I said that, and as I couldn't hold him, I just moved close
to him and stroked his hair.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd7e
STRING: His eardrums had ruptured the week before, and the
holes still hadn't completely healed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd94
STRING: That being said, there were no other external injuries.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xda0
STRING: The change in air pressure from leaving the tunnel
probably hurt his ears.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdb6
STRING: I should have made him lie down, but there was no time
to regret it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdcc
STRING: [Torta] “It's alright, Chris. I'm right here.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdfe
STRING: [Chris] “Arietta...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe14
STRING: Chris raised his head and said this, but his face was no
longer pained, it was expressionless.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe2a
STRING: [Torta] “Tortinita...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe48
STRING: [Chris] “Where am I?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe5e
STRING: [Torta] “On the train. We're headed to the city of Piova.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe86
STRING: [Chris] “The train...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe9c
STRING: His memory seemed to be a little mixed up.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xea8
STRING: But it was still a little better than before, when he didn't
recognize anything.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xebe
STRING: [Torta] “We're going to attend the Piova Communal
School of Music this spring. Do you remember?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xee6
STRING: [Chris] “I remember...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xefc
STRING: [Torta] “And now we're on the train headed there.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf1a
STRING: [Chris] “Oh...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf30
STRING: I didn't know if I should explain the rest to him now or
not.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf3c
STRING: I was silent for a while, and then suddenly Chris said
something.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf5a
STRING: [Chris] “Rain...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf70
STRING: [Torta] “Huh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf8e
STRING: [Chris] “Is it raining?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfa4
STRING: [Torta] “No, it's not raining now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfc2
STRING: [Chris] “Oh...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfe6
STRING: Chris no longer looked to be in pain, but he pressed his
fingers to his ears and gazed out the window.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xffc
STRING: The doctor had said that he may hear a ringing in his
ears, so I wasn't worried about that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1012
STRING: I was more concerned with the still unhealed wound on
his heart.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x101e
STRING: I didn't know when that wound would heal, either.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x102a
STRING: But it seemed he had calmed down, so I was relieved.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1040
STRING: I moved my gaze to look out the window, too.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1064
STRING: On the night before leaving for this city, Arie and Chris
were in an accident.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x107a
STRING: That being said, the one who was seriously injured was
Arie, not Chris.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1090
STRING: But Chris went into shock seeing Arie fallen in front of
him, and his eardrums ruptured from the sound of the
car exploding.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10a6
STRING: Arietta's injuries were more serious. She had hit her
head hard...and she was still unconscious.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10c6
STRING: One week later.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10d2
STRING: Chris almost never woke up, and when he did, he had
no memory of the event.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10e8
STRING: Luckily the damage to his eardrums was light, and
would heal on its own.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10fe
STRING: What was more worrying was Chris's mental state.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x110a
STRING: I'd let him know about Arie later, so for the time being I
brought him to the school and would check on him
while attending.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1120
STRING: That was the solution our parents came up with.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x112c
STRING: The role I was given was important, with a lot of
responsibility.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1142
STRING: I couldn't handle the pressure, and I wanted to scream.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x114e
STRING: But I desperately held it in, and moved to the seat next
to Chris.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x116a
STRING: Chris was still looking outside.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1176
STRING: I quietly touched his hand on my knee, and etched its
warmth on my heart.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x118c
STRING: [Torta] “Chris... I'll protect you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11b6
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11cc
STRING: Arie wasn't here.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11d8
STRING: And maybe... She wasn't anywhere.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11ec
STRING: Chris was mine.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1234
STRING: In the end, the sleeping car tickets I hurried to get
weren't used even once.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x124a
STRING: The reason was that Chris didn't want to move from the
unassigned seats with the windows, and my whole
body was sore because of it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1260
STRING: I had already released my grip on his hand, but the
feeling remained on my palm.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1276
STRING: Chris looked down, and mumbled something with his
bag still under his legs.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12a8
STRING: [Chris] “The City of Rain.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12be
STRING: [Torta] “Huh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12dc
STRING: [Chris] “It always rains here, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12f2
STRING: [Torta] “Yeah...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1308
STRING: This city had been called the City of Rain in the past.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1314
STRING: But that was more than 100 years ago.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1320
STRING: One of the mountains surrounding the city erupted and
due to the ash there was a period... It seemed that for a
long time it did nothing but rain on the people that
lived there.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1340
STRING: That's where the city's name came from, and many
structures and buildings in the city still showed signs.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1356
STRING: But Chris should have known that was in the past.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x136c
STRING: What was he talking about?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1380
STRING: [Chris] “So it was true, Torta.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1396
STRING: [Torta] “What was...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13ac
STRING: As I asked him that, I was unbelievably happy at him
calling my name for the first time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13ea
STRING: [Chris] “Look, can't you see it, Torta?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1418
STRING: [Torta] “Hmm...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1456
STRING: [Chris] “Come on, can't you hear it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1484
STRING: [Torta] “Can't I hear what...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14ca
STRING: [Chris] “The sound of the rain...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x156c
STRING: Whenever I sent the letters, I would sit on the rim of the
fountain and think about the past.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1582
STRING: Chris got a fever right after that and slept for three days
at my grandma's house.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1598
STRING: Chris had probably already forgotten that I nursed him
the whole time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15ae
STRING: No, it was probably better to say he didn't remember.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15c4
STRING: After that, I talked with my grandma, and stopped
denying the rain hallucinations and sounds to Chris.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15da
STRING: I still didn't know if that was the correct decision.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15e6
STRING: But Chris didn't lose his mind like that again, and he still
looked relatively healthy.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15fc
STRING: [Torta] “Chris...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1612
STRING: Until the time came for him to know the truth.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x161e
STRING: I decided then that I would protect Chris until he was
ready to accept it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1634
STRING: And that was still going on.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1658
STRING: I learned about their promise to write letters a week
after that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x166e
STRING: It was all written in the letter from Chris to Arie that
came from my house by express mail.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1684
STRING: About the drawer.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1690
STRING: The empty envelopes she gave him.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x169c
STRING: I wrote a reply and sent it by express mail back to my
house to deal with the problem of the postmark.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16b2
STRING: The only time that a letter didn't reach Chris during all
that, I covered up with the lie that Arie had injured
herself in an unfamiliar workplace.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16dc
STRING: I wondered how many lies I had told up to that point.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16e8
STRING: I was sure, too, that I would have to tell many more.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16fe
STRING: [Torta] “Chris...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1714
STRING: Thinking of him, I mumbled his name again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1720
STRING: But I just couldn't hear the sound of the rain.
